sdc.title: Fire in the Hole (new)
sdc.description: Reimagined indoor mine‑train coaster with modern effects, onboard audio & splash finale.

sdc.title: Fire in the Hole (original)
sdc.description: Iconic indoor coaster that ran since 1972 closed after 2023 season.

sdc.title: Mystic River Falls
sdc.description: River‑raft adventure with rotating lift & tallest raft drop in Western Hemisphere.

sdc.title: Lost River of the Ozarks
sdc.description: Original river rapids ride—replaced by Mystic River Falls in 2020.

sdc.title: Time Traveler
sdc.description: World’s fastest/tallest looping spinning coaster with 3 inversions.

sdc.title: Outlaw Run
sdc.description: Ground‑breaking wood coaster with 162‑ft drop & 3 inversions.

sdc.title: Fireman's Landing / FireFall
sdc.description: Family ride zone added, including FireFall double shot tower.

sdc.title: WildFire
sdc.description: B&M steel coaster featuring 5 inversions and 155‑ft drop.
